price: 39. Mais il se détourna, conforté dans son pouvoir, et dit : « Voilà bien un magicien ou  un fou ! »
arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكۡنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَٰحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fatawallā biruk'nihi waqāla sāḥirun aw majnūnun
